org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline

Class UserMeanItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline.UserMeanItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class UserMeanItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
    Rating scorer that returns the user's average rating for all predictions.

    This scorer does not directly average the user's ratings; rather, it averages their offsets from the scores produced by another scorer (the UserMeanBaseline). If this is the GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer (the default), then this is a straight user mean item scorer with damping; reconfigure it to use ItemMeanRatingItemScorer as the baseline to get a user-item personalized mean.

    This is why it is not called a mean rating item scorer; it can compute the mean of any kind of user-based score.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         @Nonnull
         MutableSparseVector items)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        items - The score vector.
